topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54641c8a63687212fc380200#post_54641c8a63687212fc380200
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54641c9d6368725f00b10100#post_54641c9d6368725f00b10100
It seems to think that making the characters sad is the same thing as making them good. We learn next to nothing about the lead girl other than she reads and has cancer. She has no personality other than that. And the whole point of the movie is trying to show that identifying people by their disabilities or ilnesses is wrong!
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
i hate any story that try to throw in random bullshit to make it look dramatic
like to make you feel bad when people you don't know die, they throw in a kid, because you'll always feel bad when kids die

or worse
when rape is just thrown in to add drama
that is just horrible
but so many people do it
